:KitKat::

She opened her comlink. "Destructor, you'd better get back here. 
We're movng. Now."

She saw on the scanners that Magmatronw as outside the base.
She opened her link. "DarkMouse, meet me at the entrance."
She gave Quickstrike the co-ordinants to the  new base. "Get everyone 
over there. I'll follow shortly."

DarkMouse walked over to the entrance and met with KitKat.  KitKat 
motioned for the mouse to follow her to the meeting with Magmatron.


KitKat looked at Magmatron. "Yes, you wanted to talk?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dachande" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> ::Magmatron/Dachande::
> 
>     "Understood," He said and shut the comm down. Then he opened a 
comm to 'Dachande'. "Cyber...Dachande, please meet me outside Kit 
Kat's base, you are helping we with a situation, it might provide 
some hunting."
>     "No way," Dachande said, then a shock of electricty went 
through him. "Did you do that?"
>     "Yes, of course," Magmatron said. He then pressed another 
button and Dachande transformed to Beast Mode, decloaking in the 
process. He then went to Kit Kat's base.
>     Magmatron set the autoguns and went to Kit Kat's base.
